channel.title: Unpacking files (connection) error Jar Client
channel.description:
I have been getting a connection error right after the Unpacking files my jar client does Download the cache and I have followed all the steps in Ric's tutorial Can someone please tell me whats wrong.
Btw: My client is Delta I use JAR MAKER [IMG]http://i797.photobucket.com/albums/yy257/xxDANxx1/error.png[/img]

item.title: Unpacking files (connection) error Jar Client
item.dc:creator: @johnl17 johnl17
item.description:
@johnl17 wrote:

OK here is what you are doing wrong, i had this problem too for awhile, ok first make a file named cache. Dont put anything in it just zip it.
Once you haved zipped it highlight each file that needs to be in the cache, sprites, the contents of the cache file etc.
Once you have highlighted each file that you need in the cache file, click one and drag it into the cache.zip “Note when you drag one, it should drag all that you had highlighted”. Now that you have done this upload the files to whatever you have set your download url downloader too.

Goodluck with your cache downloader.

Regards,
Johnl17

Read full topic
